text: Konstantin Sergeyevich Sarsania (; 11 June 1968, Moscow â€“ 7 October 2017, Moscow) was a Russian professional football coach and a former player and agent. At the time of his death he worked as director of sports for FC Zenit Saint Petersburg. He made his debut as a player in the Soviet Second League in 1988 for FC Dynamo-2 Moscow.Career stats at Foootballfacts ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Footballers from Moscow Category:Russian football managers
